desc: Show your loved one that you care and miss them by sending a Wish You Were Here Box Care Package anywhere in the world. Choose from your favourite Australian made snacks to unique gifts sourced from all over Australia including New South Wales, Queensland, Victoria, South Australia, Western Australia and Tasmania.

layout.text: Send them a taste of home!
Spread some happiness to a loved one! Send a care package and let them know that you're thinking of them and "Wish You Were Here". Flat rate shipping for Australia and the Rest of the World.
